评论详情: I liked the style overall. The fabric is light and the pants are super comfy from the waist/hip area. I’m 5’5” and usually wear a size 2 (ordered the smallest size). Everything fit great, but they were too long! Something easy to tailor, I just prefer to not make that extra investment. Will return them.
Really tight around the waste. No stretch in the waste either. The ratio between the leg size and waste is off.

评论概述: Dress up Dress down. Just buy them
评论详情: 5'6" 115-118 lbs. (depending on the day) ordered a size 4 (normal size). These pants are made for us long legged ladies. I love when I can find a pair of pants that hits the floor or even the top of any of my shoes, flats or heels, which you can wear both with these pants. They are high waisted, as in right at the belly button (I have very long legs with a short torso), slight pleat in the front (great for hiding the perimenopause pooch), elastic waist band in the back. I own them in five different colors, grey, black, khaki, green and oatmeal. They can be dressed upped for the office or dressed down for casual were (yes they are that comfy to wear). I love the cargo, baggy look of these pants. I did take one star off, because the sizing/length is not consistant. I actually had to have the oatmeal colored ones hemmed by 1" because they were actually too long (surprise)! I am excited to order more.

These were so comfortable and I got so many compliments wearing them. Very light weight and the fabric hasn’t pulled or anything after two wash cycles. Definitely a little long if you are on the shorter side. I am 5’2 and wore an inch heel and they hit the floor. The color is great and the same as in the picture.
Nice fabric good pair of pants. It’s nice for a casual dress outfit. Really cute with a bodysuit top and cute shoes. They’re comfortable and it’s easy to move around in them.

I wanted to love these, and I’ll be keeping them, but holy moly the wrinkles! I washed them and dried them and the folding wrinkles were still there like they never had been washed. I steam refreshed in the dryer, nothing. I steamed with a hand steamer and that worked great until you need to sit and immediately they start to wrinkle again. Dog hair loves them so hope you don’t have a pet or have a good lint roller.  I’m 5’3” and they’re way too long but easily can be hemmed about 5 inches. Weight is around 170 and they fit perfectly which is why I’m keeping them and will deal with the negatives.

I love these pants. They fit my waist so well and are long (which is difficult to find for tall people). They stretch around the waist and are loose enough everywhere else it gives a drape classy vibe. The only reason it isnt 5 stars is the fabric pills really easily and quickly.
I love these pants. They are so comfortable size fit me perfect and they look so cute when styled with a dressy top.
I was really excited for these because I loved the gray ones but then they got here and I tried them on they were at least an inch shorter in the leg. Very disappointed!

These cargo pants are nice and fit well. I am 5'4" and I have to wear heals with these. They are my most go to in my wardrobe. I am a pocket girl. Purses get on my nerves so the more pockets the better. There is a place for my phone, wallet and keys with a pocket to spare and that is all I need. I own to pair and am looking to buy one more in black.

5'8" 140lb I absolutely LOVE these. I love that they cover my feet which are a size 12 in women. They came in rolled thick plastic, so you will need to iron. Absolutely worth it! Ordering another pair

评论概述: Believe the hype! These pants are VERY flattering
评论详情: I wore these to a very dressy holiday party at a high end venue (ie Waldorf Astoria).  I had a long, high-end dress coat on with them, but from time to time I removed my coat when I got warm.  Every time I did, I got several compliments on my pants!  And they were just basic black pants!  I originally purchased my usual size 10 and a size up (12).  Both fit, but the sized up ones are the ones that had the trendy, flowy look I wanted.  I have thick thighs and these gave me plenty of room.  I’m buying every color, for sure.  It’s rare I think that a pair of pants makes me look thinner, but these do.  The quality of the material is great and not thin or polyester-y (I paired the pants with a St John jacket.). I’m 5’6” and the size 12 was the PERFECT length with 2” heels. Probably even 3inch or my platform adidas.  I normally wear a size 10 but they were a bit snug in the waist and WAY too short.  If you look at the size chart, each size is a different length, for some reason, so if you need/want a specific inseam, be sure to check the size chart.
Wow! These exceeded my expectations! Definitely size up one size from your normal size. The material is great. So buttery soft. I want to order these in every color. So flattering

评论概述: A must have in the every color!
评论详情: I own these cargo pants in just about every color, and I was shocked by the quality of the material. The fabric is smooth and gives the pants a tailored look, with an elastic band in the back that prevents gapping. There isn’t much stretch, but they are true to size. I typically wear a size 16 or 17 depending on the brand, and I purchased these in a size 18—they fit perfectly. The pants have functioning pockets and a real zipper, unlike some that just have decorative details. In my opinion, they are tall-friendly. At 5’6”, they look great with heels. These can easily be dressed up for an elevated casual look or paired with sneakers or flats and a tank top for a neat, casual style.

I love these pants! These will now be my new go-to pants when I don't feel like wearing jeans. They are easy to dress up or dress casually. I read the other reviews and decided to size up two sizes (I'm normally a size 8, I ordered a 12). The 12s are a bit loose around my waist, but it's easily fixed with a belt to give me even more of a snatched look. I do plan on ordering another pair for a concert. I may try the 10's and see if they fit around my waist better. But I absolutely love, love, love these pants. If you're on the fence about ordering them, do it! If you don't like them, you can always return them. But with these, I doubt you will!!
Nice material. Lightweight. Easily dressed up or down. Runs 2 sizes too small.

5’3 230 lbs. typically wear size 16 in pants. I sized up to 18 because the reviews said so. The pants fit perfectly. Very flattering on a curvy body. I did wear shaping underwear also but I had zero belly with these pants. I got the brown ones and will be getting the black. Can be dressed up for work or a date or dressed down with cute sneakers. Definitely worth the buy.

The length is great and the room in the legs and butt are great, but it is so darn tight in the waist. I had to return them. Even ordering up a size didn't help. It just made it even looser in the legs.

I love the pants however, I ordered a 16 and couldn't get it to fit even though I measured everything correctly. So I ordered an 18 and the waist was exactly the same, even down to how far I could get it closed. Overall, won't be buying again due to the lack of actually being correct on the measurements.

评论概述: Everything that’s wrong with fast fashion
